descriptions: Developed responsive and interactive UI components using React, improving user experience on various platforms.
Implemented client-side optimizations to enhance application performance and reduce load times.
Collaborated with UX/UI designers to translate design prototypes into functional and visually appealing web pages.
Assisted in integrating front-end components with back-end services via RESTful APIs.

data.position: Mid-Level Front-End Developer to Full-Stack Developer
descriptions: Transitioned from front-end development to full-stack by incorporating server-side technologies such as Node.js and Express.
Led the migration of front-end codebases to modern frameworks like Angular, enhancing maintainability and scalability.
Built and deployed scalable microservices on Azure, bridging the gap between front-end and back-end development
Developed CI/CD pipelines using Azure DevOps, automating testing and deployment processes.
Architected and implemented a full-stack e-commerce platform using Next.js for front-end and AWS Lambda for serverless back-end functions.
Enhanced the applicationâ€™s performance and scalability by leveraging serverless architecture and optimizing API endpoints.
Mentored junior developers, providing guidance on both front-end and back-end best practices and code reviews.
Improved database performance and integration, achieving a 40% reduction in application load times through optimized queries and efficient data handling.
